WorkItem.Description: Feature Request: Ability to view html email
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Ability to view html email

Comments.Message:
I would like the ability to view emails as html and not only plain text.

Thank you.
For example, I would expect to be able to click on ... tags and have my default web browser open and navigate to the href url.

Thanks for your request. smtp4dev uses the default application which is configured in order to "view" .eml files so the features of the viewer depend on what you have installed. I recommend you install Windows Live Mail or another client which is cabable of rending HTML mail.

Thank you.

I only have Outlook 2010 installed on Windows 7 64-bit and I found this registry tweak that allows me to associate and open .eml files in Outlook.

http://www.slipstick.com/mail1/open_eml.htm
